dct_title_s: Survey of the Radama Islands, and the bays of Raminitoc, Rafala and Port Radama on the west coast of Madagascar
dct_description_sm: Hydrographic chart of west coast of Madagascar; relief shown by hachures and bathymetric soundings. "705." Historic Maps copy has publisher's labels on verso: West coast of Madagascar, Narreenda Bay in Luza Bay; Africa. Narreenda Bay and Luza River. 704.
dct_publisher_sm: London : Published according to Act of Parliament at the Hydrographical Office of the Admiralty ; sold by R. B. Bate, for the Lords Commissrs. of the Admiralty, by their appointment, 7th Decr. 1827.
